results.title: Amlodipine protects the retinal ganglionic cell damage maintaining intra ocular pressure by regulating the biological activities of carrageenan like red algae: an in vivo and in-silico study.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the present study involving in silico and in vivo analysis demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AML@@@ has protective role against carr-induced oxidative stress promoting @<m>DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@RGC degeneration@@@ with IOP lowering property.

citations.NLM: Nanda A, Choudhary N, Patri M. Amlodipine protects the retinal ganglionic cell damage maintaining intra ocular pressure by regulating the biological activities of carrageenan like red algae: an in vivo and in-silico study. In Silico Pharmacol. 2025;13(2):91. PMID: 40539081

results.title: Amlodipine besylate and amlodipine camsylate prevent cortical neuronal cell death induced by oxidative stress.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine besylate@@@ and amlodipine camsylate prevent cortical @<m>DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal@@@ cell @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ induced by oxidative stress.

results.title: In vitro and in vivo efficacies of amlodipine against Listeria monocytogenes.
results.journal: Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Aml@@@ administered orally at 2.5 microg/g in female @CELLLINE_CVCL:0184 @@@BALB/c@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ for 7 days, commencing 4 days before oral challenge (1 x 10(8) CFU/ml with L. monocytogenes ATCC 51774), significantly reduced bacterial counts in the stomach (P < 0.01), liver (P < 0.01), and spleen (P < 0.05), and decreased (P < 0.05) @DISEASE_Stomach_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D013272 @@@gastric lesions@@@, neutrophilic infiltration, @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@, vascular @<m>DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@degeneration@@@, and @DISEASE_Necrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ of @DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@gastric tissues@@@.

citations.NLM: Dutta NK, Mazumdar K, DasGupta A, Dastidar SG. In vitro and in vivo efficacies of amlodipine against Listeria monocytogenes. Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis. 2009 Jul;28(7):849-53. PMID: 19184140

results.title: [Calcium antagonists: current and future applications based on new evidence. Neuroprotective effect of calcium antagonists].
results.text_hl: L-type Ca(2+) channel blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ reduced @DISEASE_Brain_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@cerebral edema@@@ and inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal@@@ cell death.
